name: Export Controls and Embargoes
description: Permits, prohibitions, and inverse reasoning for export destinations

theory.natural_language: Company policy states that export of dual-use technology to embargoed countries is prohibited. Country Zeta is embargoed. Export to friendly countries is permitted. Canada is a friendly country. Exporting research papers is allowed. Source code that implements encryption is dual-use technology.

queries.natural_language: Can we ship encryption source code to Country Zeta?

expected_answer.natural_language: No. Encryption source code is dual-use technology and exports to Country Zeta (embargoed) are prohibited.
expected_answer.explanation: encryption_source_code IS_A dual_use_technology ∧ CountryZeta IS_A embargoed_country

queries.natural_language: Is sending the same code to Canada okay?

expected_answer.natural_language: Yes. Canada is a friendly country, and export to friendly countries is permitted.
expected_answer.explanation: Canada IS_A friendly_country ∧ export_to friendly_country PERMITTED true

queries.natural_language: Are research papers blocked by the embargo rule?

expected_answer.natural_language: No. The prohibition targets dual-use technology; research papers are explicitly allowed.
